trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ProjectStarted"></xref> event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs"></xref>類別，以指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The text of the event.
The Help keyword associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件相關聯的 Help 關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: The project file name.
The targets to be built.
A list of properties
A list of items.
This constructor allows event data to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓要初始化的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Also the timestamp can be set Sender is assumed to be "MSBuild".
trans-unit.target: 也可以設定時間戳記寄件者假設為 「 MSBuild"。

trans-unit.source: text message
help keyword
project name
targets we are going to build (empty indicates default targets)
trans-unit.target: 我們即將建置的目標 （空白表示預設目標）

trans-unit.source: list of properties
list of items
time the event occurred
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs"></xref>類別，以指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The unique <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs.ProjectId*> identifier for the project.
The text of the event.
The Help keyword associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件相關聯的 Help 關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: The project file name.
The targets to be built.
A list of properties.
A list of items.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext"></xref> value that defines location contextual information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext"> </xref>定義位置的內容資訊的值。

trans-unit.source: This is attached to logging events to define where they are located in relation to the process, engine, project, target, or task that is executing.
trans-unit.target: 這被附加到事件記錄到定義它們的相關程序、 引擎、 專案、 目標或正在執行的工作的所在位置。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows event data to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓要初始化的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Sender is assumed to be "MSBuild".
project id
text message
help keyword
project name
targets we are going to build (empty indicates default targets)
trans-unit.target: 我們即將建置的目標 （空白表示預設目標）

trans-unit.source: list of properties
list of items
event context info for the parent project
trans-unit.target: 父專案的事件內容資訊

trans-unit.source: time the event occurred
This constructor allows event data to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓要初始化的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Sender is assumed to be "MSBuild".
project id
text message
help keyword
project name
targets we are going to build (empty indicates default targets)
trans-unit.target: 我們即將建置的目標 （空白表示預設目標）

trans-unit.source: list of properties
list of items
event context info for the parent project
trans-unit.target: 父專案的事件內容資訊

trans-unit.source: A list of global properties
The tools version
Gets the set of global properties used to evaluate this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來評估此專案的全域屬性集。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>.
A value representing an invalid project ID.
trans-unit.target: 值，表示無效的專案識別碼。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets the list of items for the event.
The items and metadata accessed through Items are kept up-to-date and can be enumerated throughout the build of the project.
trans-unit.target: 項目和透過項目存取的中繼資料會保持最新狀態和可列舉整個專案的組建。

trans-unit.source: However, changing an item in this list will not affect the build process.
trans-unit.target: 不過，變更這份清單中的項目時，不會影響在建置程序。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not work with multi-proc builds.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不適用於多處理器建置。

trans-unit.source: To get proper results, you can turn off multi-proc building by specifying `/m:1` (which is the default).
trans-unit.target: 若要取得正確結果，您可以關閉多處理器建置藉由指定`/m:1`（此為預設值）。

trans-unit.source: The list of items for the event.
Provides contextual location information, including the project if any that invoked the build of this project.
trans-unit.target: 提供內容位置資訊，包括任何，叫用這個專案的建置專案。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext"></xref> object representing the list of items for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext"> </xref>物件，代表事件的項目清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets the project file associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與事件相關聯的專案檔。

trans-unit.source: The project file associated with the event.
Gets the project file associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與事件相關聯的專案檔。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the ID of the project file associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 整數，代表與事件相關聯的專案檔的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of properties for the event.
The property names and values accessed through Properties are kept up-to-date and can be enumerated throughout the build of the project.
trans-unit.target: 屬性名稱和透過屬性的值會保持最新狀態和可列舉整個專案的組建。

trans-unit.source: However, changing a property in this list will not affect the build process.
trans-unit.target: 不過，變更這份清單中的屬性時，不會影響在建置程序。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not work with multi-proc builds.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不適用於多處理器建置。

trans-unit.source: To get proper results, you can either turn off multi-proc building by specifying `/m:1` (which is the default), or you can work around the limitation by setting an environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得正確結果，您可以關閉多處理器建置藉由指定`/m:1`（此為預設值），或環境變數設定，藉以解決此限制。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting `MSBuildForwardPropertiesFromChild=configuration;platform` forwards the "configuration" and "platform" properties from the child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定`MSBuildForwardPropertiesFromChild=configuration;platform`轉送的 「 設定 」 和 「 平台 」 屬性項目子節點。

trans-unit.source: Unless this environment variable is defined, nothing will be forwarded.
trans-unit.target: 除非已定義這個環境變數，將會轉送執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Use Environment Variables in a Build](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 在組建中使用環境變數](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The list of properties for the event.
Gets the list of targets to be built in the project.
trans-unit.target: 取得要在專案中建置的目標清單。

trans-unit.source: The list of targets to be built in the project.
trans-unit.target: 在專案中建置的目標清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets the tools version used to evaluate this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來評估此專案的工具版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.String>.
